After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Percentage of insurance policies renewed compared to the total number of policies due for renewal, reflecting the success of renewal efforts.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Insurance Policies / Total Number of Expiring Insurance Policies) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Assessment of how well insurance policies meet customer needs for coverage, based on customer feedback and policy evaluations.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: Average Rating of Insurance Policy Coverage Adequacy from Customer Feedback

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Degree to which insurance policies adhere to legal and regulatory requirements, measured through audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Policies / Total Number of Policies) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with their insurance policies, including coverage, cost, and service, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Insurance Policies

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process insurance claims from submission to resolution, reflecting the efficiency of the claims handling process.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Process Insurance Policy Claims

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Trends in the costs of insurance premiums over time, indicating changes in pricing strategies and market conditions.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: (Current Premium Cost - Previous Premium Cost) / Previous Premium Cost * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who renew their insurance policies compared to the total number of customers eligible for renewal, indicating retention success.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: (Number of Renewals / Number of Policies Eligible for Renewal) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.EXPLANATION: Rate at which insurance policies are updated to reflect new information, changes, or regulatory requirements, measured by the number of updates per year.
After Sales+Insurance Services+Vehicle I.FORMULA: Number of Updates to Insurance Policies / Number of Months
